text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Happy New Year!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Congrats!

text_block_list.name: Nature & Ikuno
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations.
Congratulations.
New Year's. Matikanetannhauser brought her friends to the trainer's room to hang out.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, we all made mochi, so I thought we'd share some with you, Trainer!
choice_data_list: Thanks for going out of your way

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No problem~. And... I'm pretty sure you have that thing here, right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the kotatsu!
So, to quickly warm up the Umamusume who got their hands and feet cold, we invited all four of them in.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Look, Nature, a snail!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey, don't play with it. ...But still, the kotatsu really is the best~. It's so soothing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Right! New Year's is all about the kotatsu, mochi, and mikan~.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser-san, shouldn't you show Trainer that thing you mentioned earlier?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, right! Trainer, look at this. This month's 'Monthly Twinkle'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ta-da!
My name is in here~!
Where she pointed, there it was, small but definitely 'Matikanetannhauser'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's in a little feature on newcomers to watch, saying, 'It was a race where you could feel she might do something, that kind of vibe,' see!
Since it's a good opportunity, I leaned in to read it properly, and upon closer look—
Right in the middle of that page, in much larger text, were the words 'Mihono Bourbon' and 'Top Contender for Triple Crown Umamusume.'

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ...The expectations for her aren't new, but... I see. To this extent.
The size of the text reflects the level of attention. This must be the current public opinion. It's the kind of expression that would bother someone who cares about it.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: That's right, Tannhauser-san is--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right, Bourbon-san too!
Being the top candidate for the Triple Crown Umamusume is amazing, isn't it~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's true she works hard every day, so I can understand the expectations.
Going back and forth on the hill course every day...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I need to work hard too!
Aim for the Triple Crown Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, sorry, we were talking about something, right?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. I'll be cheering for you from the sidelines too.
Please do your best this year, just like yourself.
A few hours later.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The 1st!
Heart-pounding, New Year's Luck Test Tournament~!

After this and that,
we all decided to play New Year's games.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Now then, there are three events!
'Stick with It, Kendama Showdown!'
The first one to pull off a 'World Tour' wins!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
'Run, Run, Kite-Flying Showdown!'
The one whose kite flies the highest wins!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
And, if you can make the face, you win!
'Laugh and You Lose, Fukuwarai Showdown!'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Which one should we do first!
This is up to the room's master... the Trainer!
Somehow, the one I want to try first is--
choice_data_list: Laugh and You Lose, Fukuwarai Showdown!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Good choice!
Actually, I've also picked out a nice open space!
Yes, its name is--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The Underpass!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It's true, here there are no people and no power lines in sight.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ahem! Then, let the match begin!
The judge is the Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo engine, full throttle--!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, that's high!
Turbo's got skills!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Heheh!
Turbo can go even faster! Hiyah!
(Snap)

Couldn't withstand the acceleration...
The kite string snapped, and it vanished from sight in an instant.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Aaaah!
Turbo's kite...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear.
That's... far away.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But in terms of height, Turbo wins?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, that's true.
If it's not disqualified.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Victory!?
Amazing amazing, yay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, that's great~.

And so, the Twinkle Series
Year 2 began.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, nice~!
I actually practiced a little bit!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Around the World' involves moving the ball in order: small dish, large dish, medium dish, and then the sword!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So then~...
Ready, start!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... whew~!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Aaaah!
I was so close!

And so, the sound of wood clashing
echoed in the trainer's room—
Night fell.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: This is... more difficult than I imagined.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No problem, no problem, still going~!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Grr!
Turbo can still keep going too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, my hands are starting to hurt.
And so, the second year of the Twinkle Series began.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Great! Actually, I brought a special fukuwarai with me!
What she pulled out was——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's a fukuwarai I made with the trainer's face~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm the one who sees the trainer's face the most! I thought I couldn't lose with this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, rather, I can't afford to lose! Let's do this properly!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, this is... the mouth?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Kufufufu, Machitan's got it wrong!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? It's not!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Turbo, shh!
And so, what ended up being made was——

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Nose position, accurate. Mouth position, inaccurate. Therefore——75 points!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nguu!! Not 100 points~!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, trainer! How could I have...!
And so, the second year of the Twinkle Series began.
